message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  You'll get nothing if you reject this!
I'm feeling generous, Alice. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you a good chunk, but I need to make sure I get a fair share as well.  Let's end this game on a good note.
Alice, the clock is ticking and your share is shrinking. This is my final offer - let's be done with this!
